section.title: XML Source Editor
section.para: User can use this editor to edit the Smooks configuration file directly.

section.title: Error Messages GUI
section.para: If the Smooks tools can't understand the configuration file or the configuration file was illegal(XML structure isn't right for Smooks configuration file, etc.),The error message panel will display above the XML editor.

tip.title: Note
tip.para: When the error message panel was displayed, other editors ( Graphical Editor, Configuration Editor ) will be disabled.
User can't edit the configuration file with other editors until file was right.
